param.name: expeditions_view
param.label: Default view for albums list
param.description: The default layout in the albums list view. You can add you own templates here... (only those familiar to Joomla! views and templates! Use at own risk)

param.name: showchangetemplate
param.label: Allow users to switch between album list templates
param.description: Allow users to change the template of the albums list view. If set to NO, template selected as default in the previous field will be shown

param.name: thumbs_mode
param.label: Thumbnails
param.description: How to create thumbnails: staticly or dynamicly. If you choose STATIC, all following Small thumbnail paramaters must be setted to 40, and all Big thumbnail parameters must be setted to 115

param.name: thumb_size_artist_1
param.label: Small thumbnail size for artist view
param.description: The WIDTH of the thumbnail album image used on the artist DEFAULT view

param.name: thumb_size_artist_2
param.label: Big thumbnail size for artist view
param.description: The WIDTH of the thumbnail album image used on the artist DETAILED view

param.name: artists_view
param.label: View for artists list
param.description: The layout in the artist view. You can add you own templates here... (only those familiar to Joomla! views and templates! Use at own risk)

param.name: thumb_size_artists_1
param.label: Small thumbnail size for artists detailed view
param.description: The WIDTH of the thumbnail album image used on the artists (not artist) DETAILED view

param.name: thumb_size_album_1
param.label: Small thumbnail size for album chronology bar
param.description: The WIDTH of the thumbnail album image used on the album chronology bar

param.name: thumb_size_song_1
param.label: Small thumbnail size for album image on song view
param.description: The WIDTH of the thumbnail album image used on the song view

param.name: showartistcountry
param.label: Show artist country
param.description: To show or not the country of the artist on the artist page

param.name: showartistshome
param.label: Show artists on MC home
param.description: If set to YES, artists from ALL letters will be shown on the home of MC component. BE CAREFUL!!: if this option is enabled and 'Usepagination in artists view' is disabled, ALL ARTISTS on your collection will be displayed!! (not a good idea if you have many artists...)

param.name: usepaginationartists
param.label: Use pagination in artists view
param.description: If set to YES, a pagination object will be displayed on the artists view.

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introduction text
param.description: Text to show in the frontend when entering the Music Collection Component, BEFORE the search bars

param.name: introtext2
param.label: Introduction text 2
param.description: Text to show in the frontend when entering the Music Collection Component, AFTER the search bars

param.name: processcontentplugins
param.label: Process content plugins
param.description: If set to YES, content plugins will be processed on 'Introduction text' and 'Introduction text 2' fields

param.name: keywords
param.label: Meta Keywords for MC
param.description: Keywords to include in the head section of every MC page

param.name: description
param.label: Meta description for MC
param.description: Description to include in the head section of every MC page

param.name: currency
param.label: Currency
param.description: The currency used in the price the albums

param.name: itemid
param.label: Default ItemId
param.description: ItemId to link to the ALL the links inside MC component (very usefull to mantain navigation and modules displayed while we are navigating throug MC

param.name: showletternavigation
param.label: Show letter navigation
param.description: Show ltter navigation bar at the top of each page inside Music Collection component

param.name: showalbumsearch
param.label: Show album search form
param.description: Show album search form in the frontend when entering the Music Collection Component

param.name: showsongsearch
param.label: Show song search form
param.description: Show song search form in the frontend when entering the Music Collection Component

param.name: displayplayer
param.label: Show online player for registered users
param.description: Specify who can listen to songs online

param.name: allowsongdownload
param.label: Allow song downloads
param.description: Specify who can download the audio files to their computers

param.name: allowcreateplaylists
param.label: Allow playlist storage
param.description: Allow registered users to save their playlists on the database

param.name: loadimagesplayer
param.label: Load images on the player
param.description: Not recommended for slow servers (it can slow down the page load time)

param.name: showpdficon
param.label: Show PDF icon
param.description: Displays the PDF icon at the top of artists view and artist view

param.name: showalbumcomments
param.label: Show/allow album comments
param.description: Shows album comments and allows registered users to post comments on albums

param.name: showsongcomments
param.label: Show/allow songs comments
param.description: Shows song comments and allows registered users to post comments on songs

param.name: showartistcomments
param.label: Show/allow artist comments
param.description: Shows artist comments and allows registered users to post comments on artists

param.name: showplaylistcomments
param.label: Show/allow playlists comments
param.description: Shows playlist comments and allows registered users to post comments on playlists

param.name: commentsystem
param.label: Comment engine
param.description: Choose if you want the built-in comment system included in Music Collection or you want to use the JomComment engine (you MUST have JomComment installed)

param.name: showalbumratings
param.label: Allow album ratings
param.description: Allows users to rate albums

param.name: showalbumdetails
param.label: Show album details
param.description: If set to YES, albums details (such as release date, genre, price, edition details...) are shown in the frontend album view

param.name: showalbumchrono
param.label: Show albums chronology
param.description: If set to YES, 'PREV' and 'NEXT' albums (if available) are shown on the album view

param.name: youtube_width
param.label: Youtube video embed WIDTH
param.description: The WIDTH of the Youtube video embedded on the SONG page

param.name: youtube_height
param.label: Youtube video embed HEIGHT
param.description: The HEIGHT of the Youtube video embedded on the SONG page

param.name: showhits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: To show the number of hits on albums, songs and artists

param.name: allowsongbuy
param.label: Show BUY button on songs
param.description: To show the buy button on songs, if the buy link is not empty

param.name: allowalbumbuy
param.label: Show BUY button on albums
param.description: To show the buy button on albums, if the buy link is not empty

param.name: songsserver
param.label: Songs server
param.description: The server where the songs are located. LEAVE EMPTY AS DEFAULT OPTION for use the current site. To get the songs from an external server/site, write the complete URL to that server. DO THIS ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING. Example: 'http://www.example.com/songsfolder'

param.name: songspath
param.label: Songs folder
param.description: The folder were the songs mp3 files will be, starting at your Joomla root. Must START with a SLASH. Example: '/songs'. Example: '/firstfolder/secondfolder/finalfolder'. Write only a slash for base directory. If empty, '/songs' folder will be used
